description:
My place is close to bus that takes to to trendy ditmars boulevard...n train takes you to nyc in minutes. You’ll love my place because of the coziness and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. BRAND new Insignia TV with built in ROku stick so u can view Youtube,netflix,pandora,hulu etc and many more channels..(
some subscription is needed)

There is  a bus on the corner the Q69 that takes u along ditmars blvd  to the 31 street where the N train takes u quickly to NYC...UBER is around and very cheap...try the pool setting for even more settings

NO SMOKING AT ALL IN HOUSE.. YOU CAN SMOKE IN BACKYARD..SMOKING INSIDE WILL MAKE U LOSE YOUR DEPOSIT AND END WILL TERMINATING THE (URL HIDDEN) SMOKING INSIDE...You can smoke outside in the backyard and please put out smokes in the trash...thanks
name: 2 bedroom close to nyc Wifi
review: Endroit sympa .. pour le petit déjeuner boulangerie pas loin au coin d'une rue très très cool
